As described
Loved it

Three good movies on 2 discs.

Great Day of the Flyers is my favorite. Brings up the emotional challenges of a new step-sibling. Also about fitting in verses being yourself.

Tinysauruses teaches the importance of telling the truth, even when it's difficult. It also shows the dynamics of prejudice and even persecution of a marginalized group. This is pretty impressive for a movie directed to kids.

Wisdom of Friends is sillier than the other two. But it teaches a valuable lesson that other cultures may have unfamiliar customs that apply universal principles. In other words, our habits serve a purpose, but others may have completely different habits that achieve the same purpose.
Got for my 18 yr old son for nostalgic purpose. This was his favorite as a child & we would watch together all the time.
love them

I have watched the movies in this series enough with my 3-year-old son, that I can actually sing 99% of the songs! If you are looking for movies that are age appropriate for toddlers and teach great life lessons with very light "scary" parts - then this series is for you! They are family oriented and kindness driven. It's nice to put a movie on for your child and not have to worry about it! (Mommy break of the day!)
Love it!!

Perfect for a 2-4 yo age group - no excessively scary scenes, sad parts, or words like stupid or dumb. Definitely more tame than the original, which is great for young children and toddlers.
